LanguageData.RT_AssemblyBench.label: assembly platfrom

LanguageData.RT_AssemblyCrane.label: assembly gantry
LanguageData.RT_AssemblyCrane.description: A type of crane found in industrial environments, often used in the assembly and maintenance of heavy equipment and vehicles, it requires 4 walls as pillar to support placing.
